content:
# We successfully crafted 1 stone furnace, and our inventory now reflects that we have 1 stone furnace, 10 units of coal, and 5 units of stone remaining.

# The next step is to place the stone furnace in the world so that we can start smelting iron ore into iron plates. 

# I will place the stone furnace at my current location. 

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Place the stone furnace at the current position.

# After placing the furnace, I will check the entities on the map to confirm that it has been placed successfully.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Display the current entities to verify placement.
